subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Marlins stopped the Braves’ 14-game winning streak by scoring the game’s only run in the ninth inning on a wild pitch, and the Rays were shut out by the Dodgers, despite executing the hidden-ball trick.
snippet: The Marlins stopped the Braves’ 14-game winning streak by scoring the game’s only run in the ninth inning on a wild pitch, and the Rays were shut out by the Dodgers, despite executing the hidden-ball trick.
